attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO STOP LOCAL COUNCIL TO STOP PUTTING THIS ANNOYING SPEED HUMPS IN THE ROAD, BECAUSE THEY ARE A CAUSING DAMAGED TO THE CARS SUSPENION AND JAR PEOPLE UP WHEN THEY GO OVER THEM ,CAUSING THEM MORE JOINT PROBLEMS, THEY ALSO CAUSING TRAFFIC CONJESTION, AND THEY DO NOT WORK, PEOPLE SPEED UP IN BETWEEN THEM ALSO SOMETIMES HIITING THEM AT FAST SPEED, WHICH COULD CAUSE THEM TO LOSE CONTROL OF OF THEIR CARS,I THINK WE SHOULD IMPROVE THE PARKING ON THIS ROADS, MAKING THEM SAFER,BY PARKING ON THE FRONT OR BACK OF SOME HOUSES WHICH MAY HAVE ROOM ON THEIR PROPERTYS, WHICH THEY COULD PARK IF GIVEN A FREE GRANT TO DO THE WORK

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
